channel.title: mol to svg on Güngör Budak
channel.description: Recent content in mol to svg on Güngör Budak

item.title: Generating 2D SVG Images of MOL Files using RDKit Transparent Background
item.description: The latest release of RDKit (2015-03) can generate SVG images with several lines of codes but by default the generated SVG image has a white background. The investigations on sources didn’t solve my problem as I couldn’t find any option for setting background to transparent background. An example of SVG image generation can be found on RDKit blog post called New Drawing Code. In [3] shows the SVG image generation and it returns the SVG file content in XML.
